title: Tuise Lesson three - Installing and running Tuise
content:
**Tuise** needs a vsiual interface, in this post we'll be installing exactly that.

Being all fancy, like we are, the interface will be based on React. For this, we've re-used the [2pack-list repo](https://github.com/Cloudoki/2pack-list) from this React session: [Mobile React Native](http://tuihackfridays.com/#article/10).

## Step 1

We're currently building the repo for **Step 1**, hold on.
